channel.title: Authors on Okan Bulut
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Okan Bulut

item.description:
<<<<<<< HEAD

Okan Bulut is an Associate Professor of Educational Measurement and Data Science and a member of the Centre for Research in Applied Measurement and Evaluation (CRAME) at the University of Alberta. His research interests include educational data mining, big data modeling, computerized testing, psycho-educational assessments, and statistical programming using the R programming language.

Okan Bulut is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab. His research interests include distributed robotics, mobile computing and programmable matter. He leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.
